scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=prod PREFIX=/developplatform node bin.js
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server"  "npm run support:withReact"
scripts.start:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=test  PREFIX=/developplatform node bin.js
scripts.start:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=pre  PREFIX=/developplatform node bin.js
scripts.start:daily: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=daily  PREFIX=/developplatform node bin.js
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=dev  PREFIX=/developplatform node bin.js
scripts.debug:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --progress --colors  --config webpack.config.js
scripts.debug:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=prod MDF_LANG=true MDF_LANG=false nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --inspect --only=src,node_modules/@mdf src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:self: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=self   MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:daily: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_LANG=false PREFIX=/developplatform  nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=test   MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:server:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=dev     MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/web/server -w src/web/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/web/server/index.js
scripts.debug:mobile:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development MDF_LANG=false MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack-dev-server --progress --profile --colors  --config webpack.config.js
scripts.debug:mobile:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development MDF_TARGET=mobile MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/mobile/server -w src/mobile/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.debug:mobile:server:daily: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development MDF_TARGET=mobile SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/mobile/server -w src/mobile/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.build:mobile:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile babel src -d bin --ignore src/web/client,src/business && echo '后端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:dll: npm run build:dll:dev && npm run build:dll:prod
scripts.build:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config-server.js --colors --progress && echo '后端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:client:all: npm run build:client:ys && npm run build:client:ncc
scripts.build:client:ys: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production BUILD_TYPE=YS webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：YS编译完成'
scripts.build:client:ncc: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production BUILD_TYPE=NCC webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：NCC编译完成'
scripts.support:withoutReact: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_LANG=true webpack --config webpack.support.withoutReact.config --colors --progress && echo '前端程序withoutReact：打包完成'
scripts.support:withReact: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_LANG=true node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.support.withReact.config --colors --progress && echo '前端程序withReact：打包完成'
